item.title: Calling Conventions
item.description: What is calling conventions # Calling conventions is part of the ABi and aims to define : How arguments are passed to a fonction How values are returned from a function Which function cleans the stack (callee or caller) So, calling conventions depends of the OS, processor and language. x86 calling conventions # The goal of this post is not to enumerate all x86 calling conventions but to understand what is calling conventions and how it works.
